name: Power Pig
overview: PowerPig an another excellent homebrew GBA game developed by the same developer who made the fantastic Holy Hell game for the Game Boy Advance. PowerPig is a very well made puzzle-platformer developed by genecyst. You play as a pig that is armed with a gravity gun that allows you to carry anything on your characters shoulders. This gravity gun is powered by coins, these coins are something that you collect throughout the levels. In the upper left hand corner of the screen there is a green bar that indicates how much power the gun has to use. You need to be careful of how much you use as you require the gravity gun to be able to defeat the various different enemies. ============================ Powerpig is a puzzle-platformer for gba. You are armed with a gravity gun, which gives you the possibility to carry on your shoulders anything you find. This gun is powered by coins. In the up left corner, coloured in green you got the gun charge, collect coins before it runs out of energy if you want to stay alive. D-pad: move around A-button: jump B-button: use your gravity gun More coins/enemies you carry more points you get. The scoring system and music are in an alpha state and not properly set up. i'll putting more detailed explanations in my blog very soon!
